IT IS NOT halted in the sense you think.The dealer... simply closed table..See. Stocks like this in AH.. have allotments so to speak..Once filled.. they can without reason.Push ask and bid to nadq.See once stock is off the hours ..AH and pre trade..They the dealer... (and believe it that is what they call them) can play or go home... Think" jc somgan" .as dealer..In ah and pre trade..This is how it has been and will be doneWith stocks held by investors institutions rather than entirely on the street itself..This is why Chinese co.s. unadudited ..Use jc sorgan and others like them to go public...There. Happy learning
